name: Tiny Circles (itch)
description:
Tiny Circles is a challenging game where you try to keep circles of the same colour away from each other.  Drag the circles away from each other and do not let them come into contact.

Note:

It will get harder as the game progresses as more circles will appear.  Good luck XD.

Game start - Red and Orange appear

Score 20 - Yellow appears

Score 30 - Green appears

Score 50 - Blue appears

Score 120 - Cyan appears

That's all for now! Thanks :D

If you have problems downloading or you're a mobile player
